NomaiObject: Excavation Site 1 COLEUS: My guess is Giant's Deep. 2 1 MELORAE: My guess is the sixth location. 3 1 MELORAE: Repeating the same guess, Coleus? You must be confident in your luck, my friend! 4 3 THATCH: Aunt Melorae, the tentacled species have just surfaced again! 5 4 PLUME: The Quantum Moon was indeed orbiting Giant's Deep! Coleus wins this round of the phantom moon game! 6 5 COLEUS: The tentacled species visited the surface while the Quantum Moon was orbiting Giant's Deep earlier as well! Could the Quantum Moon's presence be the cause of the surfacing phenomenon? 7 6 MELORAE: Hypothesis: Perhaps the tentacled species are being drawn to the surface by the Quantum Moon's gravity, due to their highly water-composed bodies? 8 7 PLUME: We can test this hypothesis at once. If we leave a pair of eyes at the Quantum Moon locator, we will be able to test if they surface again, or stay submerged when the Quantum Moon is visiting! 8 7 THATCH: Hypothesis confirmed! Hypothesis confirmed! The mystery of the tentacled species has been solved at last! LCJ EX1 1 LCJ EX2 2 LCJ EX3 5 LCJ EX4 6
